channel.title: General Discussion
channel.description: The place to chat about Duffers Golf.

item.title: play golf free
item.author: invalid@example.com (puttnroll)
item.dc:creator: puttnroll
item.content:encoded: tiger woods golf for xbox is awesome. can anyone suggest a game similar to that

item.title: Please dust off this mod
item.author: invalid@example.com (JACK SH!T)
item.dc:creator: JACK SH!T
item.content:encoded:
Is anyone home? No sign of life anywhere.....
Hello......
Is anyone going to breeth life back into this mod? So you didn't win MSU... You still have a good mod on your hands. Keep developing it and make it something....
Add a few more courses and a server at least....

item.title: When it's Done??
item.author: invalid@example.com (Qix77)
item.dc:creator: Qix77
item.content:encoded:
It's been a long time... When is your team going to post screen shots of the new Duffers????????

A big fan..

Qix77

item.title: Where is everyone?
item.author: invalid@example.com (JACK SH!T)
item.dc:creator: JACK SH!T
item.content:encoded:
I was just wondering what the status of the game was, and if it's still in development....
I downloaded it a few months ago, but got tired of the same 3 holes. Seems like it has potential, I would hate to see it fall by the wayside....

item.title: congrats on the award!
item.author: invalid@example.com (beefsack)
item.dc:creator: beefsack
item.content:encoded: nice work! good to see people do notice, what you guys have already done is a feat hope you still have the motivation to keep the ball rolling

item.title: Ok.. I can't wait anymore!!!!!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Qix77)
item.dc:creator: Qix77
item.content:encoded:
Just wanting to know about the current status of Duffers.

It's been a wee bit and I really want (SO BAD) to put my irish butt back into the updated mod.

Have you entered Phase 4 of the MSU contest? If not, I strongly suggest you should.

Keep us updated. We visit your site very often..

item.title: anything going on with this mod?
item.author: invalid@example.com (rider)
item.dc:creator: rider
item.content:encoded:
is anything going on with this mod? are u still working on it??? just got it to work when i found out there was a newer version then what i had.

is there only 9 holes to play in this version??? nothing seem to happen after i finish 9 holes....

thanks for the fun and different game
rider

item.title: Duffers golf is thy fun
item.author: invalid@example.com (Spindeln)
item.dc:creator: Spindeln
item.content:encoded:
I did play Duffers golf just a minute ago, i love it!
it is exactly like a golf game i had for my sega megadrive, fun as hell i say
just some minor things that could be improved,

like the ability to cancel when you have the shot / power meter thingey
more maps and characters
and also a overhead map would be really nice

well, keep up making this mod, it is the funniest mod for UT2004 ^_^

item.title: I love Duffers.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Qix77)
item.dc:creator: Qix77
item.content:encoded:
I love this mod. It's fun, it's simple to control, and it's very beautiful GFX wise.

I know that this is an early mod and will be buggy (most mod releses are) but what a really awsome mod. BTW: With my system (I'm running a power computer just FYI) I've had no prob running it.

I can see a future with this mod (unlike most of the mods out there) that could make a retail game. If you include a goffy-golf game type, this could set it off as being a "Make-something-Unreal" winner.

I...

I love Duffers.

item.title: new version with minigolf soon ?
item.author: invalid@example.com (master_newbie)
item.dc:creator: master_newbie
item.content:encoded:
will there be a new version with the minigolf gametype for us to test soon ??
we have to test it a bit before we can create maps for it

item.title: Icon?
item.author: invalid@example.com (|TS|Strider)
item.dc:creator: |TS|Strider
item.content:encoded:
hey i was just wondering if someone could make an icon for this, or if someone already has can someone tell me where to get it. this si a cool idea for a mod i have only tried it once so far and the putting messed up but i wont complain until i have time to play around with it and figure stuff out, so far looks cool good job.

If anyone finds or makes an icon either post it here or send it to me, plz.

item.title: Post Your Low Score Here
item.author: invalid@example.com (W0RF)
item.dc:creator: W0RF
item.content:encoded:
-12:

:edit: this is from the first beta. The changes in the multi alpha make it a bit tougher to shoot... so I imagine the better the physics get, the closer to par the scores will get.

A 421-yd par5 is an automatic eagle hole, though.

item.title: Are there any servers?
item.author: invalid@example.com (A_Llama)
item.dc:creator: A_Llama
item.content:encoded: Cause i can't see any in the master server. The server in the "server up" thread doesn't work either.

item.title: duffers does not start
item.author: invalid@example.com (master_newbie)
item.dc:creator: master_newbie
item.content:encoded: when I start duffers with the duffers.bat or with the ut2004 community menu I see the duffers loading screen but I get back to ut2004 without duffers

item.title: Server up
item.author: invalid@example.com (ttl)
item.dc:creator: ttl
item.content:encoded:
I put a dedicated server up anyone who wants to join it should type

"open 65.218.132.35" in the console. At the moment it does not show up in the server browser because I still need to unblock port 7787.

For anyone who wants the source for the .bat file I am starting it with:

@echof off
cd System
:start
ucc server DG-Bluffs?Game=DuffersGame.DGame?MaxPlayers=32?AdminName=YOURADMINNAME?AdminPassword=YOURADMINPASS -mod=Duffers -log=DuffersServer.log
echo SERVER CRASHED %time%...

Server up

item.title: Duffers Golf was submitted on time
item.author: invalid@example.com (CzarRizzo)
item.dc:creator: CzarRizzo
item.content:encoded: Duffers Golf was submitted to Epic on time and Coil Games would like to thank everyone for their concern and support. You have been a boost to this incredibly ambitious project.
